strings:
<voice_0x01000B77><se_def>Angelo: You...
You're the people I met at the pub, right?
What are you doing here?
<voice_0x01000B78><se_high>Jessica: What do you mean, what are we doing here!? You told us to come! Now you can take back this stupid ring and we'll be on our way!
<voice_0x01000B79><se_def>Angelo: My ring...?

<voice_0x01000B7A><se_def>Angelo: Of course!
I can still play that card!
<voice_0x01000B7B><se_def>Angelo: Listen! I've got a favour to ask.

<voice_0x01000B7C><se_high>Jessica: A favour!?
You're kidding, right!?
<voice_0x01000B7D><se_high>Jessica: What makes you think we'd want to help you?

<voice_0x01000B7E><se_def>Angelo: Just listen, all right!?
There's no time to argue!

<voice_0x01000B7F><se_def>Angelo: ...Can't you feel it?
Can't you feel the sinister presence in the abbey?
<voice_0x01000B80><se_def>Angelo: I heard that a jester got into the Abbot's residence. I'm convinced he's the source of the sinister air.
<voice_0x01000B81><se_high>Jessica: A jester!?

<voice_0x01000B82><se_def>Angelo: I don't know what he's planning to do,
but I'm sure Abbot Francisco's life is in danger!

<voice_0x01000B83><se_def>Angelo: You've got to help!
I need you to get into the Abbot's residence
and make sure that he's all right.

<voice_0x01000B84><se_def>Angelo: Believe me, if I could go myself,
I wouldn't be asking you.
But it's impossible at the moment.

<voice_0x01000B85><se_def>Angelo: I swear I will reward you. Please!
Will you go and make sure the Abbot's safe?
<voice_0x01000B86><se_def>Angelo: ...Thank you. I'm in your debt. Now, listen carefully to what I'm about to tell you.
<voice_0x01000B87><se_def>Angelo: You may have seen them already, but there are some obstinate idiots guarding the bridge to the Abbot's residence. You can't go that way.
<voice_0x01000B88><se_def>Angelo: But if you're prepared to go the long way around, there is another way to get there.
<voice_0x01000B89><se_def>Angelo: You have to leave the abbey as if you were going to Simpleton, but turn immediately left along the river...

<voice_0x01000B8A><se_def>Angelo: Just follow the river along keeping the abbey
in view.

<voice_0x01000B8B><se_def>Angelo: Keep going along the river and you'll come to
a ruin. It's the old abbey that was used before
this one.
<voice_0x01000B8C><se_def>Angelo: There's an underground passageway leading from there to the Abbot's residence.
<voice_0x01000B8D><se_def>Angelo: I'm afraid that's the only way.
<voice_0x01000B8E><se_def>Angelo: The entrance to the ruin can be opened with the Templar's ring I gave you, so you just keep hold of it, all right?

<voice_0x01000B8F><se_def>Angelo: Anyway, there's no time to lose!
It's in your hands now.
Please help the Abbot!
